name: Love Death + Ducks
description:
Find your long last love, Daisy the Duck , who hates you  with passion.

Instructions:

Plot and Simulate.

Click on "Start plotting" to draw your desired path for the player to follow.

Use the LMB button to drag the plotter around.

Then "Confirm" the plot to simulate the player motion.

Try avoiding enemies, lasers and enemy cameras.

You can always "Reset" the plot if you are not sure of the path.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
